CONTACTS_PAGE.ADD_CONTACT_TEXT: Click on the button below to add a contact

DELEGATES_PAGE.NOTE_COST_TEXT: Note that the cost of registering the delegate is
DELEGATES_PAGE.UNVOTE_CURRENT_DELEGATE: You already have a delegate, do you want to unvote {{ delegate }} first?
DELEGATES_PAGE.WARNING_SELECT_WALLET_FIRST: You need to select a wallet first to enable the voting process

INTRO_PAGE.TEXT_1: We provide all the tools you need to manage your Ark tokens, anytime, anywhere, worldwide!
INTRO_PAGE.TEXT_2: All your sensitive data is securely stored using AES-256 encryption and protected by your PIN Code
INTRO_PAGE.TEXT_3: Swipe between profiles and wallets, check your balances, send and receive funds and much more

PIN_CODE.TYPE_PIN_ENCRYPT_PASSPHRASE: Type your PIN to encrypt passphrase
PIN_CODE.TYPE_PIN_SIGN_TRANSACTION: Type your PIN to sign transaction

WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_PASSPHRASE: Backup this passphrase securely, without these words we can not restore your wallet.
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_ACCOUNT: Backup this account securely, without this data we can not restore your wallet or move your funds.
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_SECOND_PASSPHRASE: Backup this second passphrase securely, without these words we can not move your funds.
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_SECOND_PASSPHRASE_SECURELY_RETYPE: You can edit for a password of your choice. Remember to backup safely, you will need to re-type for validation.
WALLETS_PAGE.LABEL: Label
WALLETS_PAGE.SCAN_QRCODE_TEXT: Open your wallet on your PC and scan the QR code with your camera
WALLETS_PAGE.ADD_WALLET_TEXT: To import or create wallet click on the button bellow
WALLETS_PAGE.ALERT_SUCCESSFULLY_ENCRYPTED_SECOND_PASS: The second passphrase was successfully encrypted
WALLETS_PAGE.PASSPHRASE_NOT_MATCH: The passphrase entered does not match the one you just got.
WALLETS_PAGE.REMOVE_WALLET_TEXT: Your account will be removed. Make sure you have backed up, you will need the original passphrase to restore.

TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.ENCRYPT_SAVE_SECOND_PASSPHRASE: Do you want to encrypt and save your second passphrase?

PROFILES_PAGE.ADD_PROFILE_TEXT: Click on the button below to create a profile

NETWORKS_PAGE.CHOOSE_ONE: Choose one of the network types

SETTINGS_PAGE.SELECT_WALLET_FIRST_TEXT: Select a wallet first on the wallets page
SETTINGS_PAGE.CLEAR_DATA_TEXT: All your data, including created profiles, wallets and contacts will be removed from the app and reset to default.
